description:
Ikaros starts lying to her friends in an effort to act more human. Meanwhile, after Tomoki starts a business in order to raise funds for a saucy DVD, Nymph turns his life upside down by making him irresistible to women!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Delusional Story That Began with a Lie
嘘から始まる妄想劇場[ストーリー]
